assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.description: Assassins leap to the farthest enemy at the start of combat. Gain additional Critical Strike Damage and Critical Strike Chance.

bonuses.effect: +75% Critical Strike Damage & 5% Critical Strike Chance
+150% Critical Strike Damage & 20% Critical Strike Chance
+225% Critical Strike Damage & 30% Critical Strike Chance

blademaster.name: Blademaster
blademaster.description: Blademasters have a 35% chance to strike additional times each attack.

elementalist.name: Elementalist
elementalist.description: Elementalists gain double mana from attacks.

bonuses.effect: At the start of combat, summon an Elemental. Elemental has 2200 health, 100 Attack Damage, and 40 armor
At the start of combat, all adjacent allies receive +40 armor. Stacks any number of times

gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
gunslinger.description: After attacking, Gunslingers have a 50% chance to fire additional attacks.

bonuses.effect: Attack another random enemy in range
Attack 2 additional random enemies in range
Attack 4 additional random enemies in range

knight.name: Knight
knight.description: Your team ignores damage from all sources.

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.description: Rangers have a chance to double their attack speed for the next 3s.

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.description: Shapeshifters gain bonus maximum Health when they transform.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: Sorcerers gain double mana from attacking and allies have increased spell damage.
